short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy text from anywhere on Chrome to create a new Trello card with the text. Or, just use the interface to create new Trello cards!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on copied text from any website and copy to the body of a new Trello card. Or, just use the simple interface in order to easily create new Trello cards.
